title: Spinach and potato frittata
ingredients: ['500 g (1 lb 2 oz) potatoes, scrubbed and cut into 1 cm (½ in) cubes', '225 g (8 oz) baby spinach leaves, trimmed of any large stalks', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1 red pepper, quartered lengthways, seeded and thinly sliced', '5–6 spring onions, thinly sliced', '5 eggs', '2 tbsp freshly grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and pepper']
